txt.en: 'The recipe? Yes, of course! You will need to gather wild wheat, seeds, and honey, all from the Beorning-lands. Then the wheat and seeds must be ground very well. Next you add the wild honey to the mixture. Honey from the farm will not do for this step! No, that honey is far too domesticated, and Beorn's original recipe calls for wild honey!\n\n'Once the mixture is properly mixed, it is time to bake it, but don't let it cook for too long! The best honey cake is moist and not too dry!'
Wild wheat and seeds can be found north and east of the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should collect wheat and seeds for your honey cake.

'The recipe? yes of course! You will need to gather wild wheat, seeds, and honey, all from the Beorninglands. Then the wheat and seeds must be ground very well. Next add the wild honey to the mixture. Honey from the farm will not do for this step as it is not traditional of Beorn's original honey cake recipe. Once the mixture is properly mixed, it is time to bake. Make sure not to over bake it as the best honey cake is a moist one!'
Bake your batter in the oven

'Now that honey cake looks simply perfect, and it smells even better! Well done, my friend! This is your very first honey cake? I would almost not believe it! You will find this honey cake recipe bakes differently for everyone who tries to make one. Truly a signature of the baker, if you will.\n\n'Did you find the process as restful and relaxing as I did? I hope so!'

'We have both been through a lot lately, and I think a rest might be well-deserved. Do you know what I find most relaxing? The ancient art of baking, as it is practiced by our people, of course! Would you like to help me bake a honey cake? This will not be just any old cake, I assure you. This will be of the very type that Beorn of old used to bake himself! Have you ever made one of these before, [placeholder]? There are easier recipes to follow, but this is not a day for easy. I rest best when I am tested! Does that make any sense?\n\n'Come see me if you have questions about the process.'

The oven can be found at the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should wait by the oven for your cake to bake.

'We have both been through much as of late. Perhaps a rest is well deserved. I find to be most relaxed when baking. Perhaps you would like to relax and bake a honey cake? Have you baked on of Beorn's original honey cakes before? These are my favourite to bake and the ingredients for them cane only be found here. As you know, there are easier ways to make a good honey cake, and sometimes that is necessary. Today however, let us bake the traditional honey cake. I have the recipe here. Come see me at any time if you have questions.'

There are easier recipes to follow, but this is not a day for easy. I rest best when I am tested! Does that make any sense?\n\n'Come see me if you have questions about the process.'
The oven can be found at the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should take your cake out of the oven.

'Now that honey cake looks simply perfect, and it smells even better! Well done, cousin! Your skill at the oven has not fallen since you left on your journey. That honey cake has your own signature, and it is truly a dessert of which you should be proud.\n\n'Did you find the process as restful and relaxing as I did? I hope so!'
